title: Mage Breaker
content:
Mage Breaker You have a history of battling spellcasters. You gain Proficiency in Arcana and can cast True Strike.

You have a history of battling spellcasters. You gain Proficiency in Arcana and can cast True Strike.

Mage Breaker is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
